name: Drip Drop (PHFaust)
description:
Help Lumi cross through the jungle, whilst escaping the enveloping darkness, in this autoscroller. Aim and launch yourself across the stage... drip drop drip drop, oh you've turned into water.

I make short games for my patrons every month, and this is the Game of the Month for July. Every game will also be available for purchase even if you are not a Patron. If you want to support me in my game dev career, check me out on patreon.com/phfaust.
